description.para: An XML document consisting of a single c:result element (the c prefix here is bound to the http://www.w3.org/ns/xproc-step namespace) containing true when the documents compare as equal or false when differences were found.

If the fail-if-not-equal option is false and differences were found, this port may submit a summary of the differences. The existence and format of this summary document is implementation-defined and therefore depends on the XProc processor used.
Parameters controlling the comparison. Keys, values and their meaning depend on the value of the method option and the XProc processor used.
Specifies the comparison method used. If the value of this option is the empty sequence (default) or deep-equal, must do the same as the XPath deep-equal() function.
Support for any other comparison method is implementation-defined and therefore depends on the XProc processor used.
If this option is true and the documents do not compare as equal, the step raises error .

source-header.para: The following document is compared against what we supply on the alternate port. In this example the comparison checks out and returns true.
